balloonsTowerDefence

Class FloorGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • balloonsTowerDefence.FloorGrid

  • public class FloorGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the drawing of the floors on the screen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Floor[][] mapMatrix 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FloorGrid()
      constructor Fills the entire matrix with grass floors
      FloorGrid(int[][] newMapMatrix)
      constructor Fills the mapMatrix with the newMapMatrix parameter by reading each number and corresponding it to the type of floor it represents also creates a floor object that represents it and fills the mapMatrix with it

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawGridOnScreen()
      Draws the grid matrix on the screen by looping throug the mapMatrix and temporary mapping each floor to a temp floor object
      void drawGridOnScreenMapPreview(int floorSize, int xOffset, int yOffset)
      Draws the mapMatrix on the screen with the specified floor size
      Floor getFloor(int xCoord, int yCoord)
      Retrurns the floor object represented by the xCoord and the yCoord pre: none post: A floor object is returned represented by the x and y coords
      int getSquaresHigh() 
      int getSquaresWide()

      void setSquaresWide(int squaresWide)
